front.title: OSPF Extensions for Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSON) with Impairments

abstract.t: This document specifies OSPF extensions to carry information about physical impairments. This information set is required for the feasibility assessment of the lightpath to be established across an optical switched network controlled by GMPLS. The document intent is both disseminating experimental results carried out within Ericsson Research and provide an initial input for further OSPF extensions in CCAMP IETF group.
